verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump and French President Emmanuel Macron] [ARGM-TMP: once] [V: enjoyed] [ARG1: a close relationship] . But headed into the G7 summit in Canada , the two leaders are in a fight over Trump 's new tariffs on steel and aluminum .

President Donald Trump and French President Emmanuel Macron once enjoyed a close relationship . But [V: headed] [ARG1: into the G7 summit in Canada] , the two leaders are in a fight over Trump 's new tariffs on steel and aluminum .

President Donald Trump and French President Emmanuel Macron once enjoyed a close relationship . But [ARGM-PRD: headed into the G7 summit in Canada] , [ARG1: the two leaders] [V: are] [ARG2: in a fight over Trump 's new tariffs on steel and aluminum] .
